card.name: Food
card.desc: Various types of food cards, all are the same

card.name: Cure-All
card.desc: Cures any negative effects, and revives fallen players. Can be used on yourself or anyone on your tile.

old.desc: Cures any negative effects, and can revive fallen players.

card.name: Cure-All
card.desc: Cures any negative effects, and can revive fallen players.

card.name: Move your character back to Base Camp
Reveal 2 terrain cards on either side of the map without drawing event cards.

old.name: Reveal 2 cards without drawing event cards.

card.name: Reveal 2 cards without drawing event cards.
You have +1 action on all turns.
You may peek at the next terrain card at any time during your turn for free.
You may revive a player as a turn action.
Desert
card.desc: If you end your turn here, you must consume one food item. If you have no food, you fall.

card.name: Mountains
card.desc: Takes 3 movement actions to traverse.

card.name: Hunting Grounds
card.desc: Discover 1 food item when you end your turn here.

card.name: Lake
card.desc: Discover two food when revealed

card.name: River
card.desc: Takes 2 actions to traverse

card.name: Cave
card.desc: You may move between this cave and any other cave for one movement action.

card.name: Hunting Grounds
card.desc: Discover 1 food item

card.name: Trading Post
card.desc: You may trade in item cards to draw event cards

card.name: Canyon
card.desc: If your end your turn here, move to the closest River card, or Base Camp, whichever is closest

card.name: Mine
card.desc: When discovered, forfeit the rest of your turn

card.name: Town
card.desc: Gives a quest when discovered

card.name: Tundra
card.desc: Your next turn has -1 action if your end your turn here

card.name: Fortress
card.desc: When discovered, you are trapped here until another player can come and expend one combat item to rescue you.

card.name: Swamp
card.desc: Lose an item of your choice if your turn ends here

card.name: Eureka!
card.desc: Game ends if all players get to this card

card.name: Base Camp
card.desc: Start here

card.name: Sword
card.desc: Expend this at any time during your turn to fight an enemy.

cards.desc: Game ends if all players get to this card
